definition[0]: working for yourself and not employed by a company
example[1]: pension plans for the self-employed  (=people who are self-employed)
definition[1]: having your own business, rather than being employed by a company
example[2]: Over a quarter of agency-supplied computer staff are self-employed.
example[3]: Many self-employed businessmen are dependent on loans for working capital.
definition[2]: people who work for themselves, rather than being employed by a company
example[4]: One of the services we offer to the self-employed is a series of free consultations with financial and legal experts.
